title: Sausage, pepper and potato bake
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '900g fresh Italian sausages, cut into 5cm pieces', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 large potatoes, peeled and thickly sliced', '2 large green peppers, seeded and cut into wedges', '2 large red peppers, seeded and cut into wedges', '3 large onions, cut into wedges', '125ml white wine', '125ml chicken stock', '1 teaspoon dried Italian herbs', 'salt and pepper to taste']
